data.title: “Do not Pluck that Flower”: The Forest and Cultural Identity for the Temiar Tribe in Malaysia
data.meta_description: What happens to their ontology when the spirit-indwelling world of the  pre-modern community comes into contact with modernity and neoliberalism? When civilization becomes an irreversible development, where can the Indigenous tribes find their dwelling place in...
